name: AnimalKingdomandtheirsounds(FarmAnimals)
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal kingdom
des:
Learn Domestic Animals Sounds. Learning from audio is the best way to understand for Kids. Trains children with attractive characters and sounds. This is a farm animal audio with teaches through 3D animal sounds and the voices of individual animals. Your kids will find it easy to identify the animals on the farm and know their voices.
All-round development of kids is necessary. Enjoy our Fun-filled kid's training video of "Farm Animals and their sounds". Small kids can learn a lot from listening to nursery rhymes animations with educational audio and music. It helps them learn by listening to cartoon animals and interesting characters. Major update to the Skill. Thanks for all of your reviews and support. We have updated the skill with a more smooth and fault-free experience. 

Steps for using the skill:

Session 1:
User: Alexa, open animal kingdom
Alexa: Starting farm animal sounds, you can say begin to begin the player.
User: Play / Begin 
Alexa: Animal Sounds <number>
<Alexa completes the narration or user interruption>
User: Alexa, next
User: Alexa, stop
User: Alexa, shuffle
User: Alexa, next / previous
User: Alexa, resume
User: Alexa, start over
User: Yes/No


Session 2:
User: Alexa, open animal kingdom
Alexa: You were listening to Animal Sounds <number>, Would you like to resume?
User: No
Alexa: <Alexa starts over to the first episode and you can ask Alexa to step forward by saying Alexa, next> You are listening to Farm Animal Sounds. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Session 3:
User: Help
Alexa: You are listening to the Farm Animal Sounds. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Once invoked, Alexa will automatically start the conversation and play sounds. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the farm animal sounds. To start again on finishing one sound, you can ask Alexa, open animal kingdom


------------------------------------------
Disclaimer
------------------------------------------
Farm Animal sounds skill for Amazon Alexa is intended for fun and entertainment purposes only. Users of this skill are fully aware of the language and accepted to play the sounds with their own knowledge and experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
